client.controller

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • client.controller.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Thread
    The client that communicates with the server and recognizes commands received from the server.
    Author:
    Han Hollander

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String name,
      java.net.InetAddress host,
      int port,
      Game game)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a socket and input and output to write and listen for the server.
        Parameters:
        name - name of client
        host - host
        port - port of server
        game - game that made the client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if socket cant be created
